author: John von Radowitz
description: Professor Stephen Hawking has repeated his warning that human survival depends on finding a new home beyond the Earth. The search for other planets to colonise should start now, he believes. Speaking in London at a press conference previewing the Starmus science and arts festival taking place in Norway next month, the professor said: "I strongly believe we should start seeking alternative planets for possible habitation.
title: Stephen Hawking has a chilling message about the survival of humanity

description: TEHRAN, Iran (AP) — The Latest on Iran's presidential election (all times local): 5:10 p.m. ___ Norway's foreign minister is welcoming the re-election of Iranian President Hassan Rouhani. Borge Brende says he echoes the sentiment of Germany's Defense Minister Ursula von der Leyen, who said Rouhani's re-election sends a message that Iran could be serious about instituting reforms. Rouhani won by a wide margin, giving the moderate cleric a second four-year term to see out his agenda pushing for greater freedoms and outreach to the wider world. The 68-year-old incumbent secured a commanding lead of 57 percent in a race that drew more than seven out of every 10 voters to the polls.
title: The Latest: Nowegian FM welcomes Rouhani's re-election
